sense.def:
To contribute to something
pomeni pomagati, da nekaj uspe.

seg.quote: The elderly have much to contribute to the community.
...the BBC's contribution to the adult literacy campaign.

sense.def:
To contribute money
pomeni pomagati pri plačilu nečesa.

seg.quote: She persuaded friends to contribute $5,000 to the fund.
George was already contributing to Democratic Party funds.
...contributors to a fund to save the house.
The United Kingdom had to make a contribution of £1,000 million to the EEC budget.

sense.def:
Če nekaj
contributes to a situation
, je eden od vzrokov za določen položaj.

seg.quote: Soaring land prices contribute to the high cost of housing.

sense.def:
To contribute to a magazine or book
pomeni pisati članke ali sestavke, ki so objavljeni v reviji ali knjigi.

seg.quote: Distinguished writers had contributed to its pages.
She contributed anonymous items to the Chronicle.
...a contributor of short stories to a national weekly.
